description: Fully open source smart comic book reader with the ability to use OCR and TTS. A libre smart powered comic book reader. Features: ‚Ä¢ Smart speech balloons zooming. üí¨ ‚Ä¢ Speech balloons OCR and TTS. üëÄ ‚Ä¢ Supports CBZ (.zip), limited CBR (.rar), CB7 (.7z), CBT (.tar) and PDF comic book archives. ‚Ä¢ Supports different image formats on any Android device. ‚Ä¢ View ComicRack metadata. ‚Ä¢ Supports Left-to-Right (LTR) and Right-to-Left (RTL) read directions. ‚Ä¢ Supports Android 4.1+ and all available Android ABIs arm64-v8a, armeabi-v7a, x86_64 and x86. ‚Ä¢ Smart functionality performs locally on the device. ‚Ä¢ Libre application under GPLv3 or later license. ‚Ä¢ No ads, no personal data collection. üí¨ Speech balloons zooming Read digital comic books on mobile devices can be difficult especially if they have small screen. Seeneva to the rescue! Built-in Machine Learning model trained to detect speech balloons on pages allows you easily zooming and navigate through them with a touch of a finger. üëÄ OCR and TTS Have you ever wanted to copy text from speech balloons? Seeneva make it possible to use Optical Character Recognition on all founded speech balloons to extract text from them. And the built-in Android Text-To-Speech allows you to use Seeneva like audio comic book reader. ‚ùóNote: ‚Ä¢ No comic book included. ‚Ä¢ OCR and TTS features are only available for English language right now. Please read app repository https://github.com/Seeneva/seeneva-reader-android for more information about the app and known issues.
